name: Unlikely Allies (working title)
description:
'Unlikely Allies' is a prototype made for the  GMTK 2018 GameJam.
The theme was 'GENRE without MECHANIC'

Presenting 'Unlikely Allies', the card game without deck-building.

Enter a world of freaks and oddballs, where rules matter little and the strangest of combinations might elevate you to ultimate glory. In 'Unlikely Allies' battle with a randomly selected hand and discover weird and wonderful card combos, imbuing your cards with the strength of the very gods themselves! Unlikely Allies is suitable for all audiences (no pigeons, jellyfish or eldritch creatures of darkness were harmed in the making of this game).

Third-party assets used:

>> TextMesh Pro https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/beta-projects/textmesh-pro-8412...

>>Fantasy Skybox Free https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-f...
